CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y curl unzip git sudo python libssl-dev pkg-config build-essential                        cmake nano vim file wget &&     curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | bash &&     apt-get install -y nodejs &&     apt-get autoremove && apt-get clean &&     npm install --unsafe-perm -g node-sass &&     npm install --unsafe-perm -g spectacle-docs &&     npm install -g yarn &&     groupadd -r app -g 433 &&     mkdir /home/app &&     useradd -u 431 -r -g app -d /home/app -s /bin/sh -c "Default application account" app &&     chown -R app:app /home/app &&     chmod 711 /home/app
